General.Name: Empresas Tricot S.A
General.Description: Empresas Tricot S.A. operates fashion stores in Chile. It offers shirts, jeans, sweatshirts, pants, fabrics, jackets, parkas, shorts and bermudas, belt, underwear, and sportswear, as well as accessories for men and women; blouses, dresses, skirts, and pajamas for women; suits, pants and overalls, caps and hats, slippers, and shirts for men; and footwear products for women, men, and kids. The company also provides divers, socks, shirts, baby jumpsuit, caps and hats, jeans, parkas, t-shirts, and sweatshirts, as well as accessories for babies; and jackets, parkas, coats, jeans and pants, t-shirts, sweatshirts, and dresses for girls. Empresas Tricot S.A. was founded in 1952 and is based in Macul, Chile. Empresas Tricot S.A. is a subsidiary of Inversiones Retail Chile S.A.
